verses.verse: O <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, all ye <S%H1471>nations<s%>: <S%H7623>praise<s%> him, all ye <S%H523>people<s%>.

For his <S%H2617>merciful<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> is <S%H1396>great<s%> toward us: and the <S%H571>truth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD<s%>.
